content.en: Smart Mobility: Algorithms play a crucial role in the development of smart urban mobility systems and intelligent transportation. They contribute to various aspects such as decision-making, perception, planning, and optimization. For example, computer vision algorithms, machine learning predictors, and path planning algorithms are used in autonomous vehicles to improve road safety and reduce crashes. Additionally, big geospatial data analytics and interconnected sensor networks help optimize transportation networks and improve traffic flows. These technologies are essential for creating efficient and sustainable urban transportation systems.
content.da: Smart Mobility: Algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i udviklingen af smarte urbane mobilitetssystemer og intelligent transport. De bidrager til forskellige aspekter såsom beslutningstagning, perception, planlægning og optimering. For eksempel anvendes computer vision-algoritmer, maskinlæringsprediktorer og ruteplanlægningsalgoritmer i autonome køretøjer for at forbedre trafiksikkerheden og reducere ulykker. Derudover hjælper analyser af store geospatiale data og sammenkoblede sensornetværk med at optimere transportnetværk og forbedre trafikflowet. Disse teknologier er essentielle for at skabe effektive og bæredygtige urbane transportsystemer.
